location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from R Morgan, Acting Assistant to the Superintendent at Bombay, to Lieutenant William Bruce, Resident at Bushire

mods.abstract: Letter from R Morgan, Acting Assistant to the Superintendent at Bombay, to Lieutenant William Bruce, Resident at Bushire, requesting a statement of Bruce's services from his arrival in India up to the present period.
